auth.phoneRequired: Phone number is required for SMS password reset
auth.edgeLogin: Microsoft Edge browsers login without additional verification
auth.timeRestricted: Mobile access is only allowed between 10:00 AM and 1:00 PM
auth.otpBlocked: Too many OTP attempts. Please try again after {{hours}} hours.
auth.loginToAskQuestion: Login or signup to ask a question
auth.unlockPrivileges: Unlock new privileges like voting and commenting
auth.saveFavorites: Save your favorite tags, filters, and jobs
auth.collaborateKnowledge: Collaborate and share knowledge with a private group for
auth.getStackOverflow: Get Stack Overflow for Teams free for up to 50 users.

otp.title: Email Verification Required
otp.subtitle: We've sent a 6-digit verification code to
otp.noOtp: No OTP found. Please login again.
otp.otpExpired: OTP has expired. Please login again.
otp.neverShare: Never share this code with anyone. If you didn't request this login, please secure your account immediately.
otp.chromeRequired: This verification is required for Chrome-based browsers
otp.checkEmail: Check your email inbox and spam folder

loginHistory.title: Login History & Security
loginHistory.subtitle: Monitor your account activity and manage active sessions
loginHistory.terminateConfirm: Are you sure you want to terminate all other sessions? This will log out all your other devices.

questions.title: Title
questions.videoNotSupported: Your browser does not support the video tag.

language.title: Language Settings
language.verificationSubtitle: To change the language, please verify your identity
language.emailVerificationDesc: We'll send a verification code to your email address
language.smsVerificationDesc: We'll send a verification code to your mobile number
language.phoneRequired: Phone number is required for SMS verification
language.otpSentEmail: Verification code sent to your email
language.otpSentSms: Verification code sent to your phone
language.frenchEmailRequired: Email verification is required for French language
language.otherLanguageSmsRequired: SMS verification is required for this language change

validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.phoneInvalid: Please enter a valid phone number
validation.passwordMin: Password must be at least 6 characters

sidebar.searchTip: Use the search bar to find specific questions quickly
sidebar.tagTip: Browse by tags to find questions in your area of interest
sidebar.voteTip: Vote on questions and answers to help the community

askQuestion.title: Ask a public Question
askQuestion.titleDescription: Be specific and imagine you're asking a question to another person
askQuestion.titlePlaceholder: e.g. Is there an R function for finding the index of an element in a vector?
askQuestion.bodyDescription: Include all the information someone would need to answer your question
askQuestion.tagsDescription: Add up to 5 tags to describe what your question is about
askQuestion.videoTimeRestriction: Video uploads are only allowed between 2:00 PM and 7:00 PM
askQuestion.otpSendFailed: Failed to send OTP. Please try again.
askQuestion.verifyEmailFirst: Please verify your email before uploading video
askQuestion.questionPosted: You have successfully posted a question
askQuestion.postError: Error posting question. Please try again.

pointsTransfer.title: Transfer Points
pointsTransfer.selectUserAndAmount: Please select a user and enter valid points amount
pointsTransfer.minimumPoints: You need at least 10 points to transfer
pointsTransfer.notEnoughPoints: You don't have enough points to transfer

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: A tag is a keyword or label that categorizes your question with other similar questions.
tags.rightTagsDescription: Using the right tags makes it easier for others to find and answer your question

videoUpload.title: Video Upload (Optional)
videoUpload.description: Upload a video to better explain your question (Max: 2 minutes, 50MB)
videoUpload.clickToUpload: Click to upload or drag and drop
videoUpload.invalidFile: Please select a valid video file.
videoUpload.fileTooLarge: Video file size should not exceed 50MB.
videoUpload.videoTooLong: Video duration should not exceed 2 minutes.

timeRestriction.videoUploadTime: Video uploads are only allowed between 2:00 PM and 7:00 PM daily.
timeRestriction.videoCurrentlyAllowed: Video uploads are currently allowed until 7:00 PM.
